fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Use your sword (that you’ve enchanted with Satan’s energy for the power to eternally damn a target for eternity) to stab a target of your choice

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You will give powerful defense to any non-town players visiting your target for the night
-This is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose (May win while dead)
